subject: Basketball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: When LeBron James “practically cross-examined” lawyers during Saturday’s meeting to restore the players’ union, the room fell silent. Players respect James not just for his talent, but his business savvy and ability to connect.
snippet: When LeBron James “practically cross-examined” lawyers during Saturday’s meeting to restore the players’ union, the room fell silent. Players respect James not just for his talent, but his business savvy and ability to connect.
